rukus.text: Wa Laqad 'Atayna Musa Al-Kitaba Min Ba`di Ma 'Ahlakna Al-Quruna Al-'Ula Basa'ira Lilnnasi Wa Hudaan Wa Rahmatan La`allahum Yatadhakkaruna
Wa Ma Kunta Bijanibi Al-Gharbiyi 'Idh Qađayna 'Ila Musa Al-'Amra Wa Ma Kunta Mina Ash-Shahidin
Wa Lakinna 'Ansha'na Qurunaan Fatatawala `Alayhimu Al-`Umuru Wa Ma Kunta Thawiaan Fi 'Ahli Madyana Tatlu `Alayhim 'Ayatina Wa Lakinna Kunna Mursilina
Wa Ma Kunta Bijanibi At-Turi 'Idh Nadayna Wa Lakin Rahmatan Min Rabbika Litundhira Qawmaan Ma 'Atahum Min Nadhirin Min Qablika La`allahum Yatadhakkaruna
Wa Lawla 'An Tusibahum Musibatun Bima Qaddamat 'Aydihim Fayaqulu Rabbana Lawla 'Arsalta 'Ilayna Rasulaan Fanattabi`a 'Ayatika Wa Nakuna Mina Al-Mu'uminina
Falamma Ja'ahumu Al-Haqqu Min `Indina Qalu Lawla 'Utiya Mithla Ma 'Utiya Musa 'Awalam Yakfuru Bima 'Utiya Musa Min Qablu Qalu Sihrani Tazahara Wa Qalu 'Inna Bikullin Kafiruna
Qul Fa'tu Bikitabin Min `Indi Allahi Huwa 'Ahda Minhuma 'Attabi`hu 'In Kuntum Sadiqina
Fa'in Lam Yastajibu Laka Fa`lam 'Annama Yattabi`una 'Ahwa'ahum Wa Man 'Ađallu Mimmani Attaba`a Hawahu Bighayri Hudaan Mina Allahi 'Inna Allaha La Yahdi Al-Qawma Az-Zalimina
